subject: Amazon order #112-9023537-6371421 not received
description_text:
Hello,
  I ordered Simsonn Pro-X Ultra pedals and VAM Pro haptic motors.  They both had the same tracking number (FedEX 882343912056).  I received the pedals Wednesday but the motors were not in the box.  It says that Amazon.com is handling your customer service so I tried to chat and talk to them on the phone about this issue and they could not find the missing haptic motors or provide me with a refund.  They said I had to contact the seller.  

Can you please look into what happened or send me out a replacement VAM pro haptic motor 3 pc?

Attached is a copy of my order from Amazon.com





Thank you,

- Jason Purdie
  206-351-4847
  Jason.Purdie@icloud.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Jason Purdie, Here is your tracking number of the haptic reactor: JSEGT0460328033YQ, the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS
